reviewText: My fault, but if you are looking for a new Voltron cartoon, this is not it. it is a comic books set to a DVD, interesting but a little let down. Nice story, just wish it was an actual cartoon.
It was alright. I thought it was the actual cartoon instead of a comic dvd. It was okay. Thanks anyway
I recommended you to buy great DVDs at great prices from here... I will be enjoying my DVDs andd relive my child hood as well...ur never to old to watch anime

This was my favorite cartoon back in the day so i had to get these when I saw them on sale.  The cases are nice and well constructed, the quality of the DVD is great on my 61" TV and I can now watch good ole Voltron whenever I want!
It is a comic anamation cartoon. Like the old Golden book videos from the 70's & 80's. Not a bad prequel telling of the story.
This a great add on to any voltron fans colection this holiday season andat a great price too it is a definite buy
First off, this is a lot better than what I expected. Great addition to the collection. Amazing story line , character development and finally, it's Voltron. 'nuff said. Awesome.
It was pretty good. The story was different and unique. It was not what I was expecting. Children will love it or like it.

When I recieve this dvd. I was just excited to get it. I was not resure what it was about. The movie in the form of comic book style was very interesting but different from how the cartoon was created. Other than that I love the dvd very much.
